horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: Venus will transit into Scorpio and will join the Sun in the same sign, so this is a better week for your financial matters. The sky will hum with deep emotional undercurrents due to this transit. In the past week, you had a lot of financial struggles, but due to Venus’ entry, the difficulties will naturally mellow down. You will get some money, issues in the relationship will get subsided, and you will also restructure your tax, PF and finances. However, you can also expect sudden expenses too. Some secrets regarding money and relationship will come to light. There will be more conversations with your in laws, and your partner too.

Mars and Mercury are moving through the ninth house, so, your focus will shift toward growth, learning and expansion. You will spend more time I studies, travel and exploring new belief system. You will be a bit restless, and eager to breakdown from routine, but patience will be required, especially in dealing with authority figures or mentors. There will be some opportunities through long trips, and foreign collaborations too. There will be global ventures, and that will be the main priority during this time. You will also get opportunities for writing, teaching, or public speaking too.

Mercury will start its retrograde during this week and that will take place in the ninth house, so you can expect delays and reversals in these very areas. Travel plans might change at the last minute, visa or documentation issues can arise, and there will be rework in the documentation, so you need to be careful. There will be communication issues with teachers, mentors with foreign associates too. If you have any long trips, then cross check your plans, as there are chances for travel blocks and even technical glitches too. The progress may be a bit slow, but this period will help you to refine your direction, so that when Mercury turns direct, your ca moves forward with confidence.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: Venus will move into the seventh house with the Sun, so that will bring the spotlight to your relationships, partnerships, and one-to-one commitments. You will try to form new relationships, but make sure you are not forceful with anyone to follow you. This Sun-Venus duo is not good to handle the relationships, so there will be some arguments with your partners. Single natives will get chances to find a partner, but make sure you are not in a hurry to form a new relationship. You can also expect professional collaborations, so you will be attending some business meets. There will be social gatherings, like parties, weddings or birthdays.

Mars and Mercury are moving through the eighth house and that will bring your focus on joint finances, and partnerships. Mars itself is the planet for financial liabilities, so you will be having some difficulties in managing finances. You will need money, so make sure you have enough, but don’t spend it for silly matters. There will be some chances for arguments with your partners, in laws or business associates regarding money. There will be opportunities to restructure your finances, tax, and PF related matters. This period will ask you to release your old fears and patterns that have held you back from true emotional intimacy.

Mercury will start its retrograde during this week, which is actually a red flag, so this is not the right time for any kind of new deals. There will be technical issues, and travel blocks, and this retrogression is occurring in the eighth house, you may miss some money, so cross check while counting it. You will also meet someone from the past, like your old business partner or ex. A family member or partner will bring up a matter from the past that required discussion and resolution.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: Venus will move into Scorpio during this week, and Mercury will start its retrograde during this week. The Sun and Venus will impact your sixth house of work, so there are chances to attend interviews and other competitive events. There will be a lot of short projects, which needs more correction, so you have to be careful. You will surely need the support of your colleagues, so make sure you keep a good vibe with them. This will be a productive period if you are focusing on perfection. Venus will surely bring some solution to the issues, but make sure you keep yourself away from bad talk at work. Your health also will be important, and make sure you stay away from bad diet too.

The Mars and Mercury are moving through the seventh house, so you will be the centre of attraction. You will surely attend some public functions, where you will meet new people. There will be a powerful chemistry in the relationships, but make sure you do not have any huge expectations. During this week, you will go for social gatherings from personal and public domain, but kindly avoid over sharing.

Mercury will start its retrogression on the ninth, which will bring communication issues. Mercury itself is the planet for communication and electronic devices, so there are chances for technical glitches too. You should cross check the documents before you sign them, otherwise some errors can happen. This retrogression will bring people from the past, but make sure you don’t trust them easily. Retrogression means slow down, so please slowdown in your communication, otherwise you will invite troubles. However, this is a good time to restructure your existing business plans too. Job seekers have the closest opportunities to get a new job.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: Venus, the planet for love and fun will move into Scorpio this week, which will bring more fun, but the Sun’s presence is not good here. So, make sure you keep your patience with your children and youngsters as you are going to work for them. People will notice your talents, but please don’t expect too much, as the Sun with Venus is not a good combination. Please avoid high risk project, as they can bring you losses as well. Those who are in a committed relationship will surely have some issues, but they will also get opportunities to sort them down. You will find opportunities to go for social gatherings, and find new friends too.

Mars and Mercury are moving through the sixth house, so you will have some complex tasks at work, which will be short as well. Both are fast and furious planets, so there can be tense moments at work, like quick meetings, urgent calls, or last-minute rework. There are chances for new job opportunities, so job seekers should be alert. Please try to keep a good relationship with your colleagues, so make sure you are not messing up with them. Lower abdomen related issues can also come up, so please take care of your diet too.

Mercury will be retrograding from the ninth onwards, so some of the past health issues can come back. Retrogression can bring technical glitches, which can block your work and speech also can go wrong. Please cross check your communication and projects before final submission. You may also meet your ex-colleagues, or people who were troubling you. Please take care of the pets, as there are chances to miss them during this retrogression. This is a messy transit, so make sure you deal with it wisely.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: Venus will move into Scorpio, and the Sun is already there, so Leo Sun, Moon and rising signs will have a lot of focus on your family and home. You will feel the need to make your living space beautiful, and peaceful by buying some décor, rearranging some furniture or a total renovation. The Sun Venus are mutual enemies, so these things will not be easy, and if you do not have a good plan for renovation, discuss with an expert before you spend money on it. There will be some family issues which needs immediate attention too. There are chances for work from home, family gatherings and you will also make long term plans about home.

Mars and Mercury are moving through the fifth house, and this is also not a good combination, so make sure, you don’t jump into taking up any complex business projects. If you do so, there will be losses, so use this time to study about such things. You will work hard to improve your business, but there will be some flaws due to your impatience. Please make sure you cross check your projects before submission. Youngsters and children also will have some needs, and you will work with them.

Mercury will start its retrograde through the fifth house, which is a red flag for relationship. Please try to control your speech, otherwise there will be issues with your team members. There are chances for you to meet with your ex, or team mates, as Mercury retrogression can bring people from the past. Travel blocks, technical glitches and communication issues will be the part of this phase. You will also have to be careful with your love life, as there are chances for arguments with your spouse.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: Venus, the planet for love and fun will move into Scorpio and will join the Sun during this week. This transit will make you super busy, so buckle up your belt for going through the busy schedule. You will have multiple tasks majorly from writing, teaching and publishing, so you will have to multitask too. There will be a lot of conversations with siblings, or neighbours, but make sure you are not aggressive and harsh, and Sun- Venus is not a good combination. Travelling, transfers, and interdepartmental transfer also will be the part of this transit.

Mars and Mercury are moving through the fourth house, so your sharp focus will fall on your family matters. This combination will make you protective about yourself and your family. You will spend time in renovating, reorganising, or asserting your independence within the household. Mars in the fourth house will bring some tension at home, as you will speak impulsively about family issues, which can lead to confrontations. There will be family gatherings, and someone will come home to visit you. Mars and Mercury will aspect the tenth house, so your workplace also will be very hectic, so you have to keep a balance between home and family.

On the ninth, Mercury will start its retrogression through the fourth house, which will bring communication issues. Technical glitches will also come up, which can damage your electronic devices including your house hold devices. You will revisit family discussions, rethink living arrangements, or encounter problems with family members. At work, you will have to be careful, otherwise you will get rework, and your managers can critically review your project. If you want to start a fresh real estate deal, then this is not the time for that.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: For Libra Sun, Moon and rising signs, the financial matters will be very important, as the Sun and Venus will be in the second house. The Sun and Venus combo is not good, as they are mutual enemies so there will be a lot of financial needs, so make sure you manage your money wisely. You will also look for a part time or a new job which is possible during this week. The solar transit will push you to prove your values, and take pride in what you have built, but in this plight, you may have to argue for that.

Mars and Mercury are moving through the third house, so your mind and speech will become sharper, faster and more assertive making this period very communicative. You will express your ideas, defend your opinions, and take immediate action on plans, that have been waiting for momentum. There will be a lot of activities like writing, teaching and publishing. You may also take part in sports, and other competitive events too. Your daily life will speed up with a flurry of calls, messages and meetings that keep your schedule packed.

On the ninth, Mercury will turn retrograde which will make your life a bit complicated, so the universe will urge you to slow down, and think before you speak and act. This period often will bring delays in correspondence, misunderstandings in the conversations, or issues with technology, vehicles and travel plans. There are chances for you to miss messages, schedules can shift, and small mistakes in the paper work will be the signature of this time. Please double check everything before sending or signing too. You will also reconnect with your siblings, classmates, or friends during this time as retrogression means redoing everything.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: Venus, the planet for love and beauty will enter your sign during this week, and it conjunct the Sun there. This will surely draw positive attention to you, but make sure you are not being self-obsessed. This is a period of heightened attractiveness and confidence, so you will naturally radiate warmth, grace and likability, making people more inclined to support you and admire you. However, the Sun and Venus are mutual enemies, so some people may try to irritate you, so stay away from them. You will try to renew your appearance and health too. Mars and Mercury are moving through the second house of finances and speech; you will be aggressive with both.

You will try to improve your income, assert financial independence, or take bold steps towards improving your stability. Mars will make you ambitious, but make sure you are not aggressive. You will try to launch your business, find a new job in part time or fulltime mode. There is a risk of impulsive spending or arguments over money and values. This is not a great time to start a new investment, but you will try to learn new financial plans.

Mercury will start its retrogression on ninth, which will be a challenge for your financial matters and communication. Please don’t start any new financial investments during this week, as it will be a challenge, and there will errors due to carelessness. You will face delay in payments, errors in transactions, or second thought about purchases or investments. This is not the ideal time to buy new technical devices, as there will be technical glitches too. However, this is a good period to restructure your existing finances, as they need some revisions. Travel blocks, communication issues and lack of trust will be the main theme of this phase.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: During this week, Venus will move into Scorpio, which will join the Sun here, which will trigger your twelfth house. The Sun will throw light on your psyche, revealing your subconscious desires or unacknowledged feelings, while Venus will soften your emotions, but Sun and Venus are not a good combination, so, you will have some concerns regarding your emotions. Your sleep can get disturbed due to complex dreams, and health may have temporary issues too. There will be some updates about foreign collaborations, or long trips during this time. You will also spend time in prayer and meditation.

Mars and Mercury are moving through the first house, which will make you outspoken, energetic, and eager to take initiative. Mars will boost courage and drive, pushing you to assert yourself boldly, and Mercury will make you a bit restless. You will start new projects, and try to take charge of your direction. You will also try to improve your health and appearance by taking beauty treatment, buy new dress, or health care programs. There will be a lot of physical activities but you should also take care as there are chances for injuries too.

On the ninth, Mercury will turn retrograde, and that will impact your thoughts, communication style and self-expression. You will go through a period of introspection and re-evaluation. You will find it harder to articulate yourself clearly or feel misunderstood by others, and it can lead to self-doubt and hesitation before speaking. This is not necessarily negative, as it is the way of universe to slow yourself so that you can reassess yourself. There will be technical glitches and communication issues during this phase, so this is not the right time to start something new. You must cross check all the documents before final submission.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: Venus will move into Scorpio during this week, and the Sun is also there, so this is the time to take rest, reflect and heal yourself emotionally. This is a deeply introspective phase, where you will be drawn to solitude, spirituality, or creative pursuit will allow you connect with your inner world. You will be emotional about your workplace, as the Sun and Venus will aspect the sixth house of work. Since Venus is aspecting the sixth house, there will be solutions for your workplace issues. Sleep issues can come up; you will have complex dreams too. Financially, this transit can highlight hidden expenses or charitable giving, and you will also get some updates from the foreign lands.

Mars and Mercury are moving through the eleventh house, so your social life, goals and team ventures will be highly active. You will be more assertive and outspoken within friendships or networks, eager to share ideas, take initiative, and make progress towards long term ambitions. However, Mars can make you aggressive, which can create issues with your team mates. You will be invited to join new teams or job seekers may get new job as well.

Mercury will start its retrogression on the ninth, so you will have to review your long-term projects. There are chances for misunderstandings, with friends or group members can surface, often because of unclear communication or differing expectations. There will be some delays, confusion or the need of revision in the collaborative projects. This is also a time when people from your past, such as old friends, or former colleagues, may reappear, offering a chance to reconnect or resole unfinished business. You should not take up any new projects, especially such offers are coming after ninth.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: You will focus on your career, as the Sun and Venus will be in the tenth house of career and it will aspect the fourth house. You will keep a balance between home and career, which will be a hard task too. There will be some projects from arts, and business sector, as Venus is highly active. Those who work in government sector also will have more work. Job seekers will have the closest opportunities to get a new job, so they should be very alert. However, the Sun can make you a bit aggressive, and there are chances for arguments with your managers as well as family members.

Mars and Mercury are moving through the eleventh house, so you will work hard to set your future. You will be motivated to pursue your long-term goals, with confidence and may take the lead in team projects and community efforts. Mars will give you the courage and rive to assert yourself among peers, while Mercury will enhance your communication. There will be multiple opportunities to join new teams, start new long-term ventures and get some money from that. During this week, you will be unstoppable.

However, Mercury will start its retrograde on the ninth, so there will be misunderstandings and miscommunications during this time. There will be some technical glitches, and communication issues, so that will naturally have delays and obstacles. There will be some arguments with your team members, so make sure you think twice before you talk. You will have the opportunities to meet your old friends, and team mates too. This Mercury will bring opportunities to reconnect with old friends, colleagues, or networks from the past. This retrogression will encourage you to think about whether your current associations truly support your dreams and goals.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting November 9
content: During this week, Venus will move into your ninth house, and Sun is also here, so you will be naturally optimistic. The Sun will bring confidence and purpose to your beliefs, while Venus will add charm, harmony and pleasure to your pursuit of knowledge and experience. You will spend time in studies, writing and publishing your articles which will make you visible in the public. There will be foreign collaborations, global ventures too, which will help you to expand your reach. There will be some opportunities to go for spiritual meetings, which will help you to see life in a positive perspective.

Mars and Mercury are moving through your tenth house so your career is very important. Mars will make you ambitious, but make sure you are not in a hurry to work in the projects. You will also get new opportunities to work in project from sports, write, communication and media. You will take up some initiative in your work, and you will express your ideas with confidence. You will be pitching some projects, negotiate deals, or assert your opinions in a professional setting. There are chances for arguments at work, so make sure you don’t react fast.

On the ninth, Mercury will turn retrograde, and that will impact your thoughts, communication style and self-expression. You will go through a period of introspection and re-evaluation. You will find it harder to articulate yourself clearly or feel misunderstood by others, and it can lead to self-doubt and hesitation before speaking. This Mercury will bring technical glitches and communication issues, so make sure you cross check your projects before final submission too. However, this is a good period to restructure your career plans, and reapply to those jobs which you applied earlier. Travel blocks, communication issues and lack of trust will be the main theme of this phase.
